about_the_game:
Hey, we get it.  You see an Indie game, it looks interesting, but you don't want to drop the coin on a few screen shots.  No problem, try our demo first!  30 minutes of unrestricted play (sorry, no achievements) and once the 30 minutes is up, you can play for 5 minutes at a time after that.  You can make sure it suits you and works on your PC.  

So, that being said, Denizen's Den is a Rogue style, top down, turn based RPG.  What is a Rogue style RPG?  I'm glad you asked.  A Rogue style RPG is randomly generated every time you play a new game so every play through is unique, making for unlimited possibilities and tons of replay ability.  

We'd love for you to give it a try.  We created our own game, artwork and animation and sourced local artists for our background music.  Who doesn't like a techno mix behind their RPG game anyhow!  Trust us, you'll dig it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or better
  • Graphics: Card compatible with Shader Model 1.1 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Psssttt... Wanna play a Rogue style RPG for free? Try our demo of Denizen's Den - Deeper Edition. Try before you buy! Randomly generated dungeons offer an endless number of possibilities, however the demo will offer you a limited amount of time to play.
